contest-event.event-date: Feb. 3, 1980 D Durham League Contest (Section C) Durham League Contest (Section C) 30 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-c The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Second Rhapsody on Negro Spirituals Bowburn Community Centre, County Durham Prizes - 1st £30 and cup, 2nd £20 and rose bowl, 3rd £15. 4 bands competed.
